Original: As you explore the mine, you find a
fan-shaped plant at a dead end.
This is a plant called a Traveller's
Friend, prized by explorers for the
way it stores water in its stalks.
If you are thirsty, you can nibble at
the stalk, though if you are wary of
monsters, you may wish to leave.

fan-shaped plant at a dead end.

the stalk, though if you are wary of
monsters, you may wish to leave.
